tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(150)
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
  candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  candidate_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  candidate_resume TEXT,
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_data (
  job_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  job_title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  job_description TEXT,
  job_location VARCHAR(50),
  company_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
    id INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    skills TEXT,
    experience_years INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
    job_id INT,
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    experience_required INT,
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_status (
    candidate_id INT,
    job_id INT,
    stage VARCHAR(50),
    interviewer VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    resume TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_data (
    recruitment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    recruiter_id INT,
    candidate_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE recruiters (
    recruiter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE interview_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    interview_date DATE,
    interview_time TIME,
    interviewer_id INT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE job_positions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    requirements TEXT,
    salary DECIMAL(10,2),
    posted_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE applications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT REFERENCES candidates(id),
    job_id INT REFERENCES job_positions(id),
    application_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE interviews (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT REFERENCES applications(id),
    interview_date DATE,
    interviewer VARCHAR(100),
    result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE offers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT REFERENCES applications(id),
    job_id INT REFERENCES job_positions(id),
    offer_date DATE,
    salary DECIMAL(10,2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
)
